channel.title: Delta - free slots on trade interface

item.title: Delta - free slots on trade interface
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I have it 90% coded, just the int that im trying to use, seems to be not reconised when it is acually a public int. Here is what i have soo far (p.s. i know about 50 people are gonna leech it after someone fixes it rofl.)

	public void openTrade() {
		inTrade = true;
		tradeRequested = false;
		sendFrame248(3323, 3321); // trading window + bag
		resetItems(3322);
		resetTItems(3415);
		resetOTItems(3416);
		String out = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].playerName;
		//if (PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].playerRights == 1) {
		//	out = "@cr1@" + out;
		//} else if (PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].playerRights == 2) {
		//	out = "@cr2@" + out;
		//}
		sendFrame126("Trading With: "
				+ PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].playerName + "@gre@       Free Slots: " + PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].freeSlots(), 3417);
		sendFrame126("", 3431);
		sendQuest("Are you sure you want to make this trade?", 3535);
	}

Read full topic
